
# Cauldron Concrete Powder

ðŸ§ª CauldronConcretePowder is a simple yet powerful Datapack that enhances your Minecraft experience<br>
by allowing you to instantly transform concrete powder into hardened concrete by dropping it into water cauldrons!<br>
No more tedious manual placement required.

âš¡ This Datapack has been meticulously optimized for maximum performance and efficiency. Our benchmarks show it runs significantly faster than VanillaTweaks' equivalent solution.

ðŸ’¡ Originally created as a community request.
